Package index

All functions

rbind(<sftime>) cbind(<sftime>)
Bind rows (features) of sftime objects
st_intersection(<sftime>) st_difference(<sftime>) st_sym_difference(<sftime>)
Geometric operations on pairs of simple feature geometry sets (including sftime objects)
st_union(<sftime>)
Combine or union feature geometries (including sftime objects)
plot(<sftime>)
Plots an sftime object
print(<sftime>)
Prints an sftime object
st_as_sftime()
Convert a foreign object to an sftime object
st_cast(<sftime>)
Cast geometry to another type: either simplify, or cast explicitly
st_crop(<sftime>)
Crop an sftime object to a specific rectangle
st_drop_geometry(<sftime>)
Drops the geometry column of sftime objects
st_join(<sftime>) st_filter(<sftime>)
Spatial join, spatial filter for sftime objects
st_sftime() `[`(<sftime>) `[[<-`(<sftime>) `$<-`(<sftime>)
Construct an sftime object from all its components
st_time() `st_time<-`() st_set_time() st_drop_time()
Get, set, or replace time information
inner_join.sftime() left_join.sftime() right_join.sftime() full_join.sftime() semi_join.sftime() anti_join.sftime() filter.sftime() arrange.sftime() group_by.sftime() ungroup.sftime() rowwise.sftime() mutate.sftime() transmute.sftime() select.sftime() rename.sftime() slice.sftime() summarise.sftime() summarize.sftime() distinct.sftime() gather.sftime() pivot_longer.sftime() spread.sftime() sample_n.sftime() sample_frac.sftime() nest.sftime() unnest.sftime() separate.sftime() unite.sftime() separate_rows.sftime() drop_na.sftime()
'tidyverse' methods for sftime objects
transform(<sftime>)
Transform method for sftime objects
